problem_text_cn: 如图是一长为50米的游泳池的纵切面,该游泳池的最浅处为1.2米,最深处为2.2米,底面为斜坡,则底面的坡度为()
problem_text_en: The figure is a longitudinal section of a swimming pool with the length of N_0. The shallowest part of the swimming pool is N_1, the deepest part is N_2, and the bottom surface is a slope, so the slope of the bottom surface is ()
raw_answer: 解:因为水平距离为50米,则底面的坡度为\frac{2.2-1.2}{50}=1:50．故选:B．
raw_comment: 此题的关键是熟悉且会灵活应用公式:tanα(坡度)=垂直高度÷水平宽度．
